newsitem.title: USA: Lilly shares up on FDA action on Zyprexa.
newsitem.headline: Lilly shares up on FDA action on Zyprexa.

text.p: Shares in Eli Lilly & Co climbed 2-1/2 to 59-3/4 on Wall Street reaction to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration's issuing an approvable letter for the company's Zyprexa drug for schizophrenia.
"The stock is trading up on the announcement," said Deutsche Morgan Grenfell/C.J. Lawrence pharmaceuticals analyst Mariola Haggar.

At the same time, Haggar noted that issuance of the FDA letter, usually a preliminary to full marketing clearance, was widely expected. She added that final FDA approval for the drug can be expected in the next one to three months.
